screensaver.name: math-image
screensaver._description:
Display a random mathematical image. See "man math-image" for details.
Sometimes a random image is blank, or just a line across the bottom of the screen which looks blank. The code tries to be both random and interesting but doesn't always succeed. It also may be a bit slow sometimes.
The math-image home page is: http://user42.tuxfamily.org/math-image/index.html
